import Link from 'next/link' import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Grid, Image, Divider, Button, Header, Modal, Input, Form, Label, CommentActions } from 'semantic-ui-react' import axios from "axios" function updateUserSettings(props) { const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [sms, setSMS] = useState(""); const [address, setAddress] = useState(""); const handleSubmit = (evt) => { evt.preventDefault(); var formData = FormData(); formData.append("name", name); formData.append("email", email); formData.append("houseaddress", address); axios.post("http://10.0.0.142:8007/userpersonalsettings/", formData); } const onChangeName = e =>{ setName(e.target.value) } const onChangeEmail = e =>{ setEmail(e.target.value) } const onChangeSMS = e =>{ setSMS(e.target.value) } const onChangeAddress = e =>{ setAddress(e.target.value) } return (
